content.description:
La Fin Du Monde translates to The End of the World (It is also a delicious beer) 

  Sit start on the left end of the boulder with your hands in pockets, pull up to the good holds and work your way right up the hanging arete feature. The crux comes midway through, in the form of a right hand sidepull/undercling and a heel hook and crossing left hand into a good sloppy edge. From here make tension moves up to the groove at the lip.
content.location: As you approach the boulder you will walk straight into the middle of this line. Sit start low left on a flake that forms good pockets.

content.description:
A single boulder with some potential. One line has been climbed on it so far and there is potential for a few others.   

  As with most unclimbed Rumney schist the rock is still sharp in some places but it will become better as it is climbed.
